name: Pishacha
description: The Pishacha is a medium-sized fiend with the ability to shapechange into a tiger or a wolf. Its cunning nature is reflected in its chaotic appearance and the aura of malevolence around it.
memorable: Its ability to possess humanoids and create chaos makes it a particularly dangerous foe in combat.
goals: The Pishacha seeks to control and deceive others while causing mayhem in its path.
relations: As a fiend, it may be encountered alongside other chaotic evil entities or demons.
environment: It can usually be found in dark, infernal realms or places of significant chaos.
strengths: Its Shapechanger ability allows it to adapt and evade capture, while its Demonic Possession can incapacitate enemies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which it takes double from.
attacks: It can make a bite attack dealing 12 piercing damage and a claws attack dealing 10 slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Demonic Possession can incapacitate a target and create long-lasting madness.
senses: The Pishacha has a passive Perception of 15, indicating a keen awareness of its surroundings.
skills: It has proficiency in Perception, making it particularly good at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Immunities include poison damage and being poisoned.
Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
The Shapechanger ability allows it to take on the forms of animals.
Can become magically invisible until it attacks.
Possession ability allows control over its victim's actions.
test_queries: monster that can turn invisible and deceive
creature that transforms into tiger or wolf
